description: Affluent millennials in urban areas with verified email addresses
sqlQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT d.HOUSEHOLD_ID
FROM DATA d
INNER JOIN PII p ON d.HOUSEHOLD_ID = p.HOUSEHOLD_ID
LEFT JOIN EMAIL e ON d.HOUSEHOLD_ID = e.HOUSEHOLD_ID
WHERE d.AGE_GROUP IN ('30-34', '35-39', '40-44')
  AND d.INCOME_HH IN ('K. $100,000-$149,999', 'L. $150,000-$174,999', 'M. $175,000-$199,999', 'N. $200,000+')
  AND p.URBANICITY = 'Urban'
  AND e.EMAILQUALITYLEVEL >= 7
  AND e.EMAILOPTIN = 1;

description: Families with young children interested in outdoor activities
sqlQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT d.HOUSEHOLD_ID
FROM DATA d
INNER JOIN PII p ON d.HOUSEHOLD_ID = p.HOUSEHOLD_ID
WHERE d.PRESENCE_OF_CHILDREN_CODE IN ('A', 'B')
  AND d.OUTDOOR_ENTHUSIAST = 'Y'
  AND d.HOUSEHOLD_SIZE IN ('4', '5', '6+');
